targets.rawSql:
SELECT
	count(*) as Count
FROM
  	LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.Alarm a with (NOLOCK)
  	  JOIN
	  LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule ar
	    ON a.AlarmRuleID = ar.AlarmRuleID
WHERE
  ar.AlarmType = 5
    AND
  $__timeFilter(DateInserted)

SELECT
	msg.Alarm_Priority,
	COUNT(*) as Count
FROM
  (SELECT
	CASE 
		WHEN Priority >= 90 THEN 'P1'
		WHEN Priority BETWEEN 80 and 89 THEN 'P2'
		WHEN Priority BETWEEN 65 and 79 THEN 'P3'
		WHEN Priority BETWEEN 50 and 64 THEN 'P4'
		WHEN Priority < 50 THEN 'P5'
	END AS Alarm_Priority,
	MsgID
FROM 
	LogRhythm_Events.dbo.Msg with (NOLOCK)) msg
	  JOIN
	(SELECT 
		a.DateInserted,
		atm.MARCMsgID,
		a.AlarmID,
		DATEDIFF(MINUTE,am.GeneratedOn,am.OpenedOn) TTT,
		DATEDIFF(MINUTE,am.GeneratedOn,am.InvestigatedOn) TTD,
		DATEDIFF(MINUTE,am.InvestigatedOn,am.ClosedOn) TTR
	FROM 
		LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.Alarm a with (NOLOCK) 
			JOIN 
		LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.AlarmToMARCMsg atm with (NOLOCK) 
			ON a.AlarmID = atm.AlarmID
			JOIN
		[LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[AlarmMetrics] am with (NOLOCK) 
			ON a.AlarmID = am.AlarmID
			JOIN
		[LogRhythmEMDB].[dbo].AlarmRule ar
		  ON a.AlarmRuleID = ar.AlarmRuleID 
		WHERE 
		  ar.[AlarmType] = 5
		    and
      $__timeFilter(a.DateInserted)) amsg
		ON amsg.MARCMsgID = msg.MsgID
GROUP BY
	msg.Alarm_Priority
ORDER BY 
	CASE msg.Alarm_Priority
		WHEN 'Critical' THEN 1
		WHEN 'High' THEN 2
		WHEN 'Medium' THEN 3
		WHEN 'Low' THEN 4
		WHEN 'Very Low' THEN 5
	END

SELECT 
    Entity.Name AS 'Entity',
    COUNT(AlarmName.Name) AS Total_Alarms
FROM 
    [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm] AS Alarm
JOIN 
    LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule AS AlarmName ON Alarm.AlarmRuleID = AlarmName.AlarmRuleID
JOIN 
    LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.Entity AS Entity ON Entity.EntityID = Alarm.EntityID
WHERE 
    $__timeFilter(Alarm.DateInserted)
    AND AlarmName.[AlarmRuleGroup] != 'LogRhythm Diagnostics' -- Exclusion des alarmes diagnostics
GROUP BY 
    Entity.Name
ORDER BY 
    Total_Alarms DESC;

SELECT 
    Entity.Name AS 'Entity',
    COUNT(AlarmName.Name) AS Total_Alarms
FROM 
    [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm] AS Alarm
JOIN 
    LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule AS AlarmName ON Alarm.AlarmRuleID = AlarmName.AlarmRuleID
JOIN 
    LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.Entity AS Entity ON Entity.EntityID = Alarm.EntityID
WHERE 
    $__timeFilter(Alarm.DateInserted)
    AND AlarmName.[AlarmRuleGroup] != 'LogRhythm Diagnostics' -- Exclusion des alarmes diagnostics
GROUP BY 
    Entity.Name
ORDER BY 
    Total_Alarms DESC;

SELECT
entity.FullName,
   avg(DATEDIFF(MINUTE, alarm_table.DateInserted, a.DateInserted)) AS 'Time to Detect (in min)',
   avg(DATEDIFF(MINUTE, a.DateInserted, b.DateInserted)) AS 'Time to Acknowledge (in min)',
   avg(DATEDIFF(MINUTE, b.DateInserted, c.DateInserted)) AS 'Time to Qualify (in min)',
   avg(DATEDIFF(MINUTE, c.DateInserted, d.DateInserted)) AS 'Time to Report (in min)',
   avg(DATEDIFF(MINUTE, c.DateInserted, e.DateInserted)) AS 'Time to Resolve (in min)'
FROM [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[AlarmHistory] a
JOIN [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm] alarm_table
   ON a.AlarmID = alarm_table.AlarmID
join [LogRhythmEMDB].[dbo].[Entity] as entity on alarm_table.EntityID=entity.EntityID
LEFT JOIN [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[AlarmHistory] b
   ON a.AlarmID = b.AlarmID
   AND b.Comments = 'Changed status to: Open: Working'
LEFT JOIN [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[AlarmHistory] c
   ON a.AlarmID = c.AlarmID
   AND (c.Comments = 'Changed status to: Closed: False Alarm' OR c.Comments = 'Changed status to: Open: Escalated')
LEFT JOIN [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[AlarmHistory] d
   ON a.AlarmID = d.AlarmID
   AND d.Comments = 'Changed status to: Closed: Reported'
LEFT JOIN [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[AlarmHistory] e
   ON a.AlarmID = e.AlarmID
   AND e.Comments = 'Changed status to: Closed: Resolved'
WHERE a.Comments = 'Changed status to: Open'
group by entity.FullName

SELECT 
    Entity.Name AS 'Entity',
    COUNT(AlarmName.Name) AS Total_Alarms
FROM 
    [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm] AS Alarm
JOIN 
    LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule AS AlarmName ON Alarm.AlarmRuleID = AlarmName.AlarmRuleID
JOIN 
    LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.Entity AS Entity ON Entity.EntityID = Alarm.EntityID
WHERE 
    $__timeFilter(Alarm.DateInserted)
    AND AlarmName.[AlarmRuleGroup] != 'LogRhythm Diagnostics' -- Exclusion des alarmes diagnostics
    AND AlarmStatus=0
GROUP BY 
    Entity.Name
ORDER BY 
    Total_Alarms DESC;

SELECT
entity.FullName,
   avg(DATEDIFF(MINUTE, alarm_table.DateInserted, a.DateInserted)) AS 'Time to Detect',
   avg(DATEDIFF(MINUTE, a.DateInserted, b.DateInserted)) AS 'Time to Acknowledge',
   avg(DATEDIFF(MINUTE, b.DateInserted, c.DateInserted)) AS 'Time to Qualify',
   avg(DATEDIFF(MINUTE, c.DateInserted, d.DateInserted)) AS 'Time to Report',
   avg(DATEDIFF(MINUTE, c.DateInserted, e.DateInserted)) AS 'Time to Resolve'
FROM [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[AlarmHistory] a
JOIN [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm] alarm_table
   ON a.AlarmID = alarm_table.AlarmID
join [LogRhythmEMDB].[dbo].[Entity] as entity on alarm_table.EntityID=entity.EntityID
LEFT JOIN [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[AlarmHistory] b
   ON a.AlarmID = b.AlarmID
   AND b.Comments = 'Changed status to: Open: Working'
LEFT JOIN [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[AlarmHistory] c
   ON a.AlarmID = c.AlarmID
   AND (c.Comments = 'Changed status to: Closed: False Alarm' OR c.Comments = 'Changed status to: Open: Escalated')
LEFT JOIN [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[AlarmHistory] d
   ON a.AlarmID = d.AlarmID
   AND d.Comments = 'Changed status to: Closed: Reported'
LEFT JOIN [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[AlarmHistory] e
   ON a.AlarmID = e.AlarmID
   AND e.Comments = 'Changed status to: Closed: Resolved'
WHERE a.Comments = 'Changed status to: Open'
group by entity.FullName

LEFT JOIN [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[AlarmHistory] b

select Name, (ISNULL(AutoClosed,0)+ISNULL(New,0)+ISNULL(OpenAlarm,0)+ISNULL(Reported,0)+ISNULL(Resolved,0)+ISNULL(FalsePositive,0)+ISNULL(Monitor,0)) as Total,ISNULL(New,0) as New,ISNULL(OpenAlarm,0) as 'Open',ISNULL(Reported,0) as Reported,ISNULL(Resolved,0) as Resolved,ISNULL(FalsePositive,0) as 'False Positive',ISNULL(Monitor,0) as Monitor,ISNULL(AutoClosed, 0 )as 'Auto Closed'
from
(
select AlarmName.Name,count(AlarmName.Name) as AlarmCount,
(Convert(nvarchar, Case When AlarmStatus = 4 Then 'AutoClosed' When AlarmStatus = 8 Then 'Reported' When AlarmStatus = 6 Then 'Resolved' When AlarmStatus = 5 Then 'FalsePositive' When AlarmStatus = 0 Then 'New' When AlarmStatus = 1 Then 'OpenAlarm' when AlarmStatus = 9 Then 'Monitor' End)) as AlarmStatus
from [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm] as Alarm join LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule as AlarmName on Alarm.AlarmRuleID=AlarmName.AlarmRuleID
where $__timeFilter(Alarm.AlarmDate) AND AlarmStatus != 5
group by AlarmName.Name,AlarmStatus
 ) d
pivot
(
  max(AlarmCount)
  for AlarmStatus in (AutoClosed,New,Reported,Resolved,FalsePositive,OpenAlarm,Monitor)
) piv

select Name, (ISNULL(AutoClosed,0)+ISNULL(New,0)+ISNULL(OpenAlarm,0)+ISNULL(Reported,0)+ISNULL(Resolved,0)+ISNULL(FalsePositive,0)+ISNULL(Monitor,0)) as Total,ISNULL(New,0) as New,ISNULL(OpenAlarm,0) as 'Open',ISNULL(Reported,0) as Reported,ISNULL(Resolved,0) as Resolved,ISNULL(FalsePositive,0) as 'False Positive',ISNULL(Monitor,0) as Monitor,ISNULL(AutoClosed, 0 )as 'Auto Closed'
from
(
select AlarmName.Name,count(AlarmName.Name) as AlarmCount,
(Convert(nvarchar, Case When AlarmStatus = 4 Then 'AutoClosed' When AlarmStatus = 8 Then 'Reported' When AlarmStatus = 6 Then 'Resolved' When AlarmStatus = 5 Then 'FalsePositive' When AlarmStatus = 0 Then 'New' When AlarmStatus = 1 Then 'OpenAlarm' when AlarmStatus = 9 Then 'Monitor' End)) as AlarmStatus
from [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm] as Alarm join LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule as AlarmName on Alarm.AlarmRuleID=AlarmName.AlarmRuleID
where $__timeFilter(Alarm.AlarmDate) AND AlarmStatus = 5
group by AlarmName.Name,AlarmStatus
 ) d
pivot
(
  max(AlarmCount)
  for AlarmStatus in (AutoClosed,New,Reported,Resolved,FalsePositive,OpenAlarm,Monitor)
) piv
